metadata.description: Rose is not a happy young woman; she is closed off and angry and she hates her job. But her life changes drastically when she inherits her father's bakery in a small town in Brittany. Returning to a place that brought her both joy and grief forces her to confront painful memories of her past and find the courage to open her heart to a new, happier life that awaits her if she will just let it. A story about new beginnings, filled with small town charm, delicious pastries and the warmth of home and friends.
metadata.name: Days of Sugar and Spice
